text: Excellent food,  my Co workers and I stop here for lunch regularly.  Prices are excellent and portions are very large.  I recommend an extra order of the homemade chips,  grilled chicken salad,  and the odinator.
This is a great, little place - Big portions, everything is homemade, reasonable prices, and an owner who personally ensures a quality product and service.

I love this place.  When I lived closer I was there at least once a week.  Now that I live a little further away I make it there about once a month.  Great Food.  Friendly service.  My favorite is their Pizza.  Price's are very reasonable.
Had the liver and onions special today and it was wonderful. I will make a point to come here at least once a week. Very happy to recommend
